thread.title: Nick Mangold perfectly trolls himself after being released by Jets
thread.title_full: Nick Mangold perfectly trolls himself after being released by Jets

title: Nick Mangold perfectly trolls himself after being released by Jets
text:
Mar 2, 2017 at 7:33p ET 0Shares 
Nick Mangold sure didn’t lose his sense of humor after learning the New York Jets cut him after 11 years with the team. 
The 33-year-old, who was released Saturday, took to Twitter on Thursday and made it look like he learned of the disheartening news while at Disney World. nnnn now I'm a free agent. #ThatEscalatedQuickly pic.twitter.com/ebm5jusZkm 
— Nick Mangold (@nickmangold) March 2, 2017 
Mangold’s expression is priceless. At least the seven-time Pro Bowl center isn’t too broken up about it.
